__e: It's a terrible sin, and she acts like it didn't even happen.
But if she does, then she's the one who sinned, and you're the one who can go out there and drop the Joel-pole in whoever the hell you want to.
It's a terrible sin and you're two years younger than me.
I know, a wrong deed, but for noble reasons.
It is said there is no sin in killing a beast, only in killing a man.
I'm in mortal sin because of you!
Girl, pride is a deadly sin and you is too young to die.
For you, what happened isn't a mortal sin.
That's still a sin of the flesh.
I've asked me to free me from guilt,sin,fear and He came and He washed 'em away
It'd be a sin not to make the end come as soon as possible.
You are everything that I am, plus one more sin:
I find myself wondering... Wondering if it would be a sin if you held me? Something like that.
Don't you understand that every minute I stay with you is a sin against him?
You have sinned against me against your family against God.
I know that I've sinned against God and my wife with that woman.
I will tell you, when the sin is abhorrent, unnatural.
If that sin is on your soul, my son, you must make your peace with God.
For some,the greatest sin is to turn away and do nothing.
